</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server </value></part><part><name/>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets a time multiplier for in-game time. The command range is now capped at 0.1 - 120 to avoid performance problems. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setTimeMultiplier''' value</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - has to be in range from 0.1 to 120 </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setTimeMultiplier]] 60;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[setTimeMultiplier]] 0.5;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[timeMultiplier]], [[skipTime]], [[setAccTime]], [[accTime]], [[time]], [[serverTime]], [[date]], [[daytime]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Server-side only in multi-player. </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
